typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductId as string,
		DefaultUoMId as string,
		DefaultUoMScheduleId as string,
		PriceLevelId as string,
		BusinessScenarioCode as integer,
		BusinessScenario as string,
		BusinessScenarioSeqNo as long,
		PoolCode as integer,
		Pool as string,
		PoolSeqNo as long,
		PrimaryProductCode as integer,
		PrimaryProduct as string,
		PrimaryProductSeqNo as long,
		ProductTypeCode as integer,
		ProductType as string,
		ProductTypeSeqNo as long,
		ItemGroup as string,
		ItemName as string,
		Model as string,
		ProductName as string,
		ProductFamily as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		QuantityDecimal as integer,
		RevSumCategory as string,
		RevSumDivision as string,
		SuperRevSumDivision as string,
		Manufacturer as string,
		Version as string,
		CrmInstanceId as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		ModifiedById as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		StateCode as integer,
		StatusSeqNo as long,
		Status as string,
		StatusCode as integer,
		StatusReason as string,
		StatusReasonSeqNo as long,
		OdsCreatedDate as timestamp,
		OdsModifiedDate as timestamp,
		VersionNumber as long,
		TenantId as integer,
		ParentProductId as string,
		ProductStructureCode as integer,
		ProductStructure as string,
		ProductStructureSeqNo as long,
		PfamSkid as string,
		ProdSkid as string,
		OdsStatus as integer,
		PlatformCreatedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDate as timestamp,
		PlatformModifiedDateAsInt as long,
		activelyused as boolean,
		productfriendlyname as string,
		SearchKeywords as string,
		solutionareacode as integer,
		solutionarea as string,
		solutionareaSeqNo as long,
		whentouse as string,
		baseproductcode as integer,
		baseproductSeqNo as long,
		baseproduct as string,
		vendorid as string,
		vendorpartnumber as string,
		extractid as string,
		extractdatetime as timestamp,
		loadts as timestamp,
		deltaactioncode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cseo',
	folderPath: 'standardized/masterandreference/msx/hub_vw_product/v1/standard') ~> msxproduct
msxproduct filter(OdsStatus==0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
